name: pil2-stark-js
description: Build a stark from a PIL

scripts.test: npm run test:helpers && npm run test:stark && npm run test:circuits && npm run test:fflonk
scripts.test:fibonacci: npm run fibonacci_buildconst && npm run fibonacci_exec && npm run fibonacci_buildstarkinfo && npm run fibonacci_pil_verify && npm run fibonacci_buildchelpers && npm run fibonacci_buildconsttree && npm run fibonacci_prove && npm run fibonacci_verify && npm run fibonacci_gencircom && run fibonacci_compileverifier && npm run fibonacci_starkVerifier
scripts.test:fibonacci:gpu: npm run fibonacci_buildconst && npm run fibonacci_exec && npm run fibonacci_buildstarkinfo_gpu && npm run fibonacci_pil_verify && npm run fibonacci_buildchelpers && npm run fibonacci_buildconsttree_gpu && npm run fibonacci_prove && npm run fibonacci_verify && npm run fibonacci_starkVerifier
scripts.test:fibonacci:C12:pil: npm run fibonacci_C12_setup && npm run fibonacci_C12_exec && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo && npm run fibonacci_C12_pil_verify
scripts.test:fibonacci:C12:pil:im: npm run fibonacci_C12_setup && npm run fibonacci_C12_exec && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo_preparePil && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo_calculateImPols && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo_genPilCode && npm run fibonacci_C12_pil_verify
scripts.test:fibonacci:C12:pil:im:opt: npm run fibonacci_C12_setup && npm run fibonacci_C12_exec && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo_preparePil && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo_calculateImPols_opt && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo_genPilCode && npm run fibonacci_C12_pil_verify
scripts.test:fibonacci:C12:prove: npm run fibonacci_C12_buildchelpers && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildconsttree && npm run fibonacci_C12_prove && npm run fibonacci_C12_verify && npm run fibonacci_C12_gencircomBN128 && npm run fibonacci_C12_starkVerifierBN128
scripts.test:fibonacci:C12:prove:custom: npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo_custom && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildchelpers && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildconsttree && npm run fibonacci_C12_prove && npm run fibonacci_C12_verify && npm run fibonacci_C12_gencircomBN128 && npm run fibonacci_C12_starkVerifierBN128
scripts.test:all: npm run all_buildconst && npm run all_exec && npm run all_buildstarkinfo && npm run all_pil_verify && npm run all_buildchelpers && npm run all_buildconsttree && npm run all_prove && npm run all_verify && npm run all_gencircom && npm run all_compileverifier && npm run all_starkVerifier
scripts.test:all:im: npm run all_buildconst && npm run all_exec && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_preparePil && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_calculateImPols && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_genPilCode && npm run all_pil_verify && npm run all_buildconsttree && npm run all_prove && npm run all_verify && npm run all_starkVerifier
scripts.test:all:im:opt: npm run all_buildconst && npm run all_exec && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_preparePil && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_calculateImPols_opt && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_genPilCode && npm run all_pil_verify && npm run all_buildconsttree && npm run all_prove && npm run all_verify && npm run all_starkVerifier
scripts.test:all:gpu: npm run all_buildconst && npm run all_exec && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_gpu && npm run all_pil_verify && npm run all_buildconsttree_gpu && npm run all_prove && npm run all_verify && npm run all_starkVerifier
scripts.test:all:C18:pil: npm run all_C18_setup && npm run all_C18_exec && npm run all_C18_buildstarkinfo && npm run all_C18_pil_verify

scripts.test:all:C18:prove: npm run all_C18_buildchelpers && npm run all_C18_buildconsttree && npm run all_C18_prove && npm run all_C18_verify && npm run all_C18_gencircomBN128 && npm run all_C18_starkVerifierBN128
scripts.test:fibonacci:pil2: npm run fibonacci_pil2_buildconst && npm run fibonacci_pil2_exec && npm run fibonacci_pil2_buildstarkinfo && npm run fibonacci_pil2_pil_verify && npm run fibonacci_pil2_buildchelpers && npm run fibonacci_pil2_buildconsttree && npm run fibonacci_pil2_prove && npm run fibonacci_pil2_verify && npm run fibonacci_pil2_starkVerifier

scripts.test:C18: npm run verifier_C18_setup && npm run verifier_C18_exec && npm run verifier_C18_buildstarkinfo && npm run verifier_C18_pil_verify && npm run verifier_C18_buildconsttree && npm run verifier_C18_prove && npm run verifier_C18_verify && npm run verifier_C18_gencircomBN128 && npm run verifier_C18_starkVerifierBN128
scripts.test:buildstarkinfo:zkevm:im:opt: mkdir -p tmp && npm run zkevm_buildstarkinfo_preparepil && npm run zkevm_buildstarkinfo_calculateimpols_opt && npm run zkevm_buildstarkinfo_genpilcode
scripts.test:buildstarkinfo:all:im:opt: mkdir -p tmp && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_preparePil && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_calculateImPols_opt && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_genPilCode
scripts.test:buildstarkinfo:C12:im:opt: mkdir -p tmp && cp test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci.c12.pil tmp/fibonacci.c12.pil && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo_preparePil && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo_calculateImPols_opt && npm run fibonacci_C12_buildstarkinfo_genPilCode
scripts.test:buildstarkinfo:C18:im:opt: mkdir -p tmp && cp test/state_machines/sm_all/all.c18.pil tmp/all.c18.pil && npm run all_C18_buildstarkinfo_preparePil && npm run all_C18_buildstarkinfo_calculateImPols_opt && npm run all_C12_buildstarkinfo_genPilCode
scripts.fibonacci_pil_verify: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_pilverifier.js -m tmp/fibonacci.commit -i tmp/fibonacci.publics.json -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main2.pil -c tmp/fibonacci.const -s tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -e tmp/fibonacci.expressionsinfo.json
scripts.fibonacci_buildstarkinfo: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_genstarkinfo.js -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main2.pil -s test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci.starkstruct.json -i tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -e tmp/fibonacci.expressionsinfo.json -v tmp/fibonacci.verifierinfo.json
scripts.fibonacci_buildstarkinfo_gpu: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_genstarkinfo.js -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main.pil -s test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci.starkstruct.gpu.json -i tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -e tmp/fibonacci.expressionsinfo.json -v tmp/fibonacci.verifierinfo.json
scripts.fibonacci_buildconsttree: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_buildconsttree.js -c tmp/fibonacci.const -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main2.pil -s tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -t tmp/fibonacci.consttree -v tmp/fibonacci.verkey.json
scripts.fibonacci_buildconsttree_gpu: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_buildconsttree.js -c tmp/fibonacci.const -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main.pil -s tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -t tmp/fibonacci.consttree -v tmp/fibonacci.verkey.json
scripts.fibonacci_prove: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_prover.js -m tmp/fibonacci.commit -i tmp/fibonacci.publics.json -c tmp/fibonacci.const -t tmp/fibonacci.consttree -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main2.pil -s tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -e tmp/fibonacci.expressionsinfo.json -o tmp/fibonacci.proof.json -z tmp/fibonacci.proof.zkin.json -b tmp/fibonacci.public.json
scripts.fibonacci_verify: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_verifier.js -s tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -i tmp/fibonacci.verifierinfo.json -o tmp/fibonacci.proof.json -b tmp/fibonacci.public.json -v tmp/fibonacci.verkey.json
scripts.fibonacci_gencircom: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_pil2circom.js -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main.pil -s tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -i tmp/fibonacci.verifierinfo.json -v tmp/fibonacci.verkey.json -o tmp/fibonacci.verifier.circom
scripts.fibonacci_C12_setup: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/compressor/main_compressor_setup.js -r tmp/fibonacci.verifier.r1cs -p tmp/fibonacci.c12.pil -c tmp/fibonacci.c12.const -e tmp/fibonacci.c12.exec
scripts.fibonacci_C12_exec: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/compressor/main_compressor_exec.js -i tmp/fibonacci.proof.zkin.json -w tmp/fibonacci.verifier_js/fibonacci.verifier.wasm -p tmp/fibonacci.c12.pil -e tmp/fibonacci.c12.exec -m tmp/fibonacci.c12.commit
